description: Details required for Condition 8 (Waste and Recycling (Details)) of planning permission 22/02876/FUL (Redevelopment of the existing building (Class E use) to provide a 5-storey building with Class E floorspace at ground floor and 9no. residential units above with refuse/recycling facilities, cycle store and associated works)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient and inappropriate information for the discharge of condition 8 (Waste and Recycling (Details)) of planning permission 22/02876/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure proper waste management in the interests of the character and appearance of the area and the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The submitted details propose material changes to the internal layout of the development approved under planning permission ref: 22/02876/FUL. Material amendments cannot be made to the approved scheme via a discharge of condition application.
